short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A selfie Chrome App that lets you capture yourself in a Nintendo Game Boy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Game Boy Selfie lets you capture yourself in a Nintendo Game Boy.  By taking ideas from the past and technology from today, this app brings to the table a delightful combination that evokes nostalgia and makes for a fun selfie filter.  You can take a selfie and use it for your profile on social media.  Share this app with your friends, and have fun!

This is an open source project, and you can find the repository on GitHub at https://github.com/kamoroso94/gbselfie-chrome-app.

This app was submitted in a competition and won the MLH Prize!  Go to http://devpost.com/software/game-boy-selfie-w6j4a to learn more.
